entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
